column4: hi, i use conky and see that the speed of my cpu is changign all the time. are such high frequent changes harmful?
no. needed to save power, especially on a notebook
what program is running?

i don't get you... a process called bluetooth is running... don't knwo where it's coming from... as i said, i purged all blue* realted packages i can find... i don't know where this process is coming from...
paste the bluetooth line please
use aux
plz join pastete
what is pastete?
jsut temporay so that i can paste the lines
don't wnat to spam the channel and do not know how to make private chat with irssi right now
single line is not channel spam.
not a process but a kernel pseudeo process
how do you know?
the brackets, no memory used, etc
so anything i can do about it?
I just told you what you can do. but why do you want it gone?
it's strange that it comes up in my process list, although everything connected to bluetooth is removed
no it's not strange
i don'Ã„t use bluetooth... and got interested, after it was/is so difficult to remove...
did i miss something? how can i remaove it?
you can probably blacklist if you insist
hm ok... does it influence my system performance?

since ot seems like ths process is not doing anything (=reducing my avail. system ressource) i think i'll leave it--- i was merely worried that my system is f*ckd up in a way, because i still have ths process although i removed everything realated to it... thank you for your advice, help and patience
